issue.title: [Java] Add support for second/microsecond/nanosecond timestamps in-memory and in IPC/JSON layer
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-477](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-477). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is provided for in the metadata

https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/format/Message.fbs#L85

and we have implemented it in C++/Python. In JSON, we may need to use strings if there are numerical precision issues
